00022 static const char* media_name[psstream::FORMAT_NUM] =
00023 {
00024   "A4", "A3", "A0"
00025 };
00026 static const int media_width[psstream::FORMAT_NUM] =
00027 {
00028   595, 842, 2384
00029 };
00030 static const int media_height[psstream::FORMAT_NUM] =
00031 {
00032   842, 1191, 3370
00033 };
00034 
00036 
00037 static char* temp_name(const char* prefix)
00038 {
00039   TCHAR path[_MAX_PATH];
00040   if (!GetTempPath(_MAX_PATH, path))
00041     return 0;
00042 
00043   TCHAR spec[_MAX_PATH];
00044   if (!GetTempFileName(path, prefix, 0, spec))
00045     return 0;
00046 
00047   char* ch = new char[lstrlen(spec)+1];
00048   lstrcpy(ch, spec);
00049   return ch;
00050 }
00051 
00052 double modulo_range(double x, double modulo)
00053 {
00054   if (x < 0.0)
00055   {
00056     x += modulo * ceil(-x / modulo);
00057   }
00058   else if (x >= modulo)
00059   {
00060     x -= modulo * floor(x / modulo);
00061   }
00062   return x;
00063 }
00064 
00065 static void append(std::ostream& out, const char* file)
00066 {
00067   std::ifstream in(file);
00068   std::string rec;
00069   while (std::getline(in, rec))
00070   {
00071     out << rec << '\n';
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 static std::ostream& init_doc(const char* name, std::ofstream& file)
00076 {
00077   if (*name != 0 && *name != '\0' && stricmp(name, "con") != 0 
00078     && stricmp(name, "con:") != 0 && stricmp(name, "conout$") != 0)
00079   {
00080     file.open(name);
00081     return file;
00082   }
00083   return std::cout;
00084 }

00087 
00088 psstream_impl::psstream_impl(const char* file)
00089 {
00090   output_file = strcpy(new char[strlen(file)+1], file);
00091   font_resource = temp_name("PSS");
00092   setup_section = temp_name("PSS");
00093   out.open(setup_section);
00094   page = 0;
00095   glyph_data = 0;
00096   font_size = line_width = 1.0;
00097   format = psstream::FORMAT_A4;
00098   orientation = psstream::PORTRAIT;
00099   has_outlineshow = false;
00100   has_textproc = false;
00101   has_lerpproc = false;
00102   has_initarray = false;
00103   is_procedure = false;
00104 
00105   std::fill(has_pattern, has_pattern + psstream::NUM_PATTERNS, false);
00106   pattern_line_width = 0.0;
00107   pattern_scale_factor = 2.0;
00108 }
00109 
00110 psstream_impl::~psstream_impl()
00111 {
00112   if (out.is_open())
00113     out.close();
00114 
00115   std::ofstream of;
00116   std::ostream& doc = init_doc(output_file, of);
00117 
00118   int page_number = script.size();
00119   if (page_number > 0)
00120   {
00121     int bb[4];
00122     page_list::iterator it = script.begin();
00123     page_type *page = *it;
00124     bb[0] = (int) floor(page->bbox[0]);
00125     bb[1] = (int) ceil(page->bbox[1]);
00126     bb[2] = (int) floor(page->bbox[2]);
00127     bb[3] = (int) ceil(page->bbox[3]);
00128     while (++it != script.end())
00129     {
00130       page = *it;
00131       int x1 = (int) floor(page->bbox[0]);
00132       int x2 = (int) ceil(page->bbox[1]);
00133       int y1 = (int) floor(page->bbox[2]);
00134       int y2 = (int) ceil(page->bbox[3]);
00135       if (bb[0] > x1) bb[0] = x1;
00136       if (bb[1] < x2) bb[1] = x2;
00137       if (bb[2] > y1) bb[2] = y1;
00138       if (bb[3] < y2) bb[3] = y2;
00139     }
00140 
00141     doc << "%!PS-Adobe-3.0\n%%LanguageLevel: 2\n%%BoundingBox: "; 
00142       if (orientation == psstream::PORTRAIT)
00143     {
00144       doc << bb[0] << ' ' << bb[2] << ' ' << bb[1] << ' ' << bb[3];
00145     }
00146     else
00147     {
00148       doc << pageheight() - bb[2] << ' ' << bb[0] << ' ' 
00149         << pageheight() - bb[3] << ' ' << bb[1];
00150     }
00151     doc << "\n%%Pages: " << page_number << "\n%%DocumentMedia: "
00152       << media_name[format] << ' ' << media_width[format] << ' '
00153       << media_height[format] << " 80 white ( )\n%%Orientation: " 
00154       << (orientation == psstream::LANDSCAPE? "Landscape": "Portrait") 
00155       << "\n%%EndComments\n%%BeginProlog\n";
00156     append(doc, font_resource);
00157     doc << "%%EndProlog\n%%BeginSetup\n";
00158     append(doc, setup_section);
00159     doc << "%%EndSetup\n";
00160 
00161     page_number = 1;
00162     for (it = script.begin(); it != script.end(); ++it)
00163     {
00164       page = *it;
00165       doc << "%%Page: " << page_number << ' ' << page_number << '\n';
00166       if (page->has_bbox)
00167       {
00168         if (orientation == psstream::PORTRAIT)
00169         {
00170           doc << "%%PageBoundingBox: " << floor(page->bbox[0]) << ' ' 
00171             << floor(page->bbox[2]) << ' ' << ceil(page->bbox[1]) << ' ' 
00172             << ceil(page->bbox[3]) << '\n';
00173         }
00174         else
00175         {
00176           doc << "%%PageBoundingBox: " << pageheight() - floor(page->bbox[2]) << ' ' 
00177             << floor(page->bbox[0]) << ' ' << pageheight() - ceil(page->bbox[3]) << ' ' 
00178             << ceil(page->bbox[1]) << '\n';
00179         }
00180       }
00181       doc << "%%BeginPageSetup\nsave\n";
00182       if (orientation == psstream::LANDSCAPE)
00183         doc << "90 rotate 0 " << -media_width[format] << " translate\n";
00184       doc << "%%EndPageSetup\n";
00185       append(doc, page->code);
00186       doc << "restore\nshowpage\n";
00187       ++page_number;
00188       DeleteFile(page->code);
00189       delete[] page->code;
00190       delete page;
00191     }
00192     doc << "%%Trailer\n%%EOF\n";
00193   }
00194   DeleteFile(setup_section);
00195   DeleteFile(font_resource);
00196   delete[] setup_section;
00197   delete[] font_resource;
00198   delete[] output_file;
00199 }
00200 
00201 void psstream_impl::updatebb(double x1, double x2, double y1, double y2)
00202 {
00203   if (page->has_bbox)
00204   {
00205     if (page->bbox[0] > x1) page->bbox[0] = x1;
00206     if (page->bbox[1] < x2) page->bbox[1] = x2;
00207     if (page->bbox[2] > y1) page->bbox[2] = y1;
00208     if (page->bbox[3] < y2) page->bbox[3] = y2;
00209   }
00210   else 
00211   {
00212     page->bbox[0] = x1;
00213     page->bbox[1] = x2;
00214     page->bbox[2] = y1;
00215     page->bbox[3] = y2;
00216     page->has_bbox = true;
00217   }
00218 }
00219 
00220 void psstream_impl::updatecp(double x, double y)
00221 {
00222   page->curr[0] = x;
00223   page->curr[1] = y;
00224   page->has_curr = true;
00225 }
00226 
00227 inline void psstream_impl::newpage()
00228 {
00229   page = new page_type;
00230   script.push_back(page);
00231   page->code = temp_name("PSS");
00232   if (out.is_open())
00233     out.close();
00234   out.open(page->code);
00235   page->has_bbox = false;
00236   page->has_curr = false;
00237 }

00239 inline void psstream_impl::moveto(double x, double y)
00240 {
00241   out << x << ' ' << y << " moveto\n";
00242   updatecp(x, y);
00243   updatebb(x, x, y, y);
00244 }

00246 inline void psstream_impl::lineto(double x, double y)
00247 {
00248   out << x << ' ' << y << " lineto\n";
00249   updatecp(x, y);
00250   updatebb(x, x, y, y);
00251 }
00252 
00253 inline void psstream_impl::curveto(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, double x3, double y3)
00254 {
00255   out << x1 << ' ' << y1 << ' ' << x2 << ' ' << y2 << ' ' << x3 << ' ' << y3 << " curveto\n";
00256   updatecp(x3, y3);
00257   updatebb(std::min(std::min(x1, x2), x3), std::max(std::max(x1, x2), x3), \
00258     std::min(std::min(y1, y2), y3), std::max(std::max(y1, y2), y3));
00259 }
00260 
00261 inline void psstream_impl::rlineto(double x, double y)
00262 {
00263   out << x << ' ' << y << " rlineto\n";
00264   if (page->has_curr)
00265   {
00266     page->curr[0] += x;
00267     page->curr[1] += y;
00268     updatebb(page->curr[0], page->curr[0], page->curr[1], page->curr[1]);
00269   }
00270 }
00271 
00272 inline void psstream_impl::show(const char* text)
00273 {
00274   if (!page->has_curr)
00275     return;
00276 #if 1
00277   out << '<';
00278   int k = 0;
00279   for (const char *ch = text; *ch; ++ch)
00280   {
00281     out << std::hex << std::setfill('0') << std::setw(2) << (int) (unsigned char) *ch;
00282     if (++k % 36 == 0) out << '\n';
00283   }
00284   out << "> show\n" << std::dec;
00285 #else
00286   out << '(' << text << ") show\n";
00287 #endif
00288   double bb[4];
00289   textbox(text, bb);
00290   updatebb(page->curr[0]+bb[0], page->curr[0]+bb[2], \
00291     page->curr[1]+bb[1], page->curr[1]+bb[3]);
00292   updatecp(page->curr[0]+bb[2]-bb[0], page->curr[1]);
00293 }

00324 
00325 static void unit_arc_bbox(double a1, double a2, double bb[4])
00326 {
00327   if (a1 > a2)
00328     a2 += 2*M_PI;
00329   bb[0] = bb[1] = cos(a1);
00330   bb[2] = bb[3] = sin(a1);
00331   for (double a = 0.5*M_PI*ceil(a1/(0.5*M_PI)); a < a2; a += 0.5*M_PI)
00332   {
00333     double x = cos(a), y = sin(a);
00334     if (bb[0] > x) bb[0] = x;
00335     if (bb[1] < x) bb[1] = x;
00336     if (bb[2] > y) bb[2] = y;
00337     if (bb[3] < y) bb[3] = y;
00338   }
00339   double x = cos(a2), y = sin(a2);
00340   if (bb[0] > x) bb[0] = x;
00341   if (bb[1] < x) bb[1] = x;
00342   if (bb[2] > y) bb[2] = y;
00343   if (bb[3] < y) bb[3] = y;
00344 }
00345 
00346 inline void psstream_impl::arc(double x, double y, double r, double a1, double a2)
00347 {
00348   out << x << ' ' << y << ' ' << r << ' ' << a1 << ' ' << a2 << " arc\n";
00349   a1 = modulo_range(a1*M_PI/180.0, 2*M_PI);
00350   a2 = modulo_range(a2*M_PI/180.0, 2*M_PI);
00351   double bb[4];
00352   unit_arc_bbox(a1, a2, bb);
00353   updatebb(x+r*bb[0], x+r*bb[1], y+r*bb[2], y+r*bb[3]);
00354   updatecp(x+r*cos(a2), y+r*sin(a2));
00355 }
00356 
00357 inline void psstream_impl::arcn(double x, double y, double r, double a1, double a2)
00358 {
00359   out << x << ' ' << y << ' ' << r << ' ' << a1 << ' ' << a2 << " arcn\n";
00360   a1 = modulo_range(a1*M_PI/180.0, 2*M_PI);
00361   a2 = modulo_range(a2*M_PI/180.0, 2*M_PI);
00362   double bb[4];
00363   unit_arc_bbox(a2, a1, bb);
00364   updatebb(x+r*bb[0], x+r*bb[1], y+r*bb[2], y+r*bb[3]);
00365   updatecp(x+r*cos(a2), y+r*sin(a2));
00366 }

00370   out << w << " setlinewidth\n";
00371   line_width = w;

00373 
00374 bool psstream_impl::setfont(const char* name, double scale)
00375 {
00376   font_table::iterator it = font_data.find(name);
00377   if (it == font_data.end())
00378   {
00379     HMODULE hh = GetModuleHandle(PSSTREAM_MODULE);
00380     if (!hh)
00381     {
00382       hh = LoadLibrary(PSSTREAM_MODULE);
00383       if (!hh)
00384         return false;
00385     }
00386 
00387     HRSRC rc = FindResource(hh, name, "pfmz");
00388     if (!rc)
00389       return false;
00390 
00391     HGLOBAL data = LoadResource(hh, rc);
00392     if (!data)
00393       return false;
00394 
00395     std::ofstream app(font_resource, std::ios::app);
00396     short *addr = (short*) LockResource(data) - 32*5; 
00397     DWORD size = SizeofResource(hh, rc);
00398     if (size > sizeof(short)*(256-32)*5)
00399     {
00400       app << "%%BeginResource: font " << name << '\n';
00401       z_stream zz;
00402       zz.zalloc = Z_NULL;
00403       zz.zfree = Z_NULL;
00404       zz.opaque = 0;
00405       zz.next_in = (Bytef*) (addr + 5 * 256);
00406       zz.avail_in = size - sizeof(short)*(256-32)*5;
00407       int code = inflateInit(&zz);
00408       if (code != Z_OK)
00409         return false;
00410 
00411       char buff[512];
00412       zz.next_out = (Bytef*) buff;
00413       zz.avail_out = sizeof(buff);
00414       code = inflate(&zz, Z_NO_FLUSH);
00415       while (code == Z_OK)
00416       {
00417         app.write(buff, sizeof(buff) - zz.avail_out);
00418         zz.next_out = (Bytef*) buff;
00419         zz.avail_out = sizeof(buff);
00420         code = inflate(&zz, Z_NO_FLUSH);
00421       }
00422 
00423       if (code != Z_STREAM_END)
00424       {
00425         code = inflateEnd(&zz);
00426         return false;
00427       }
00428 
00429       app.write(buff, sizeof(buff) - zz.avail_out);
00430       code = inflateEnd(&zz);
00431       app << "%%EndResource\n";
00432     }
00433     
00434     font_table::key_type key = name;
00435     font_table::value_type val = std::make_pair(key, addr);
00436     it = font_data.insert(val).first;
00437   }
00438   out << '/' << name << " findfont " << scale << " scalefont setfont\n";
00439   glyph_data = it->second;
00440   font_size = scale;
00441   return true;
00442 }
00443 
00444 void resize_box(double *bbox, double delta)
00445 {
00446   bbox[0] -= delta;
00447   bbox[1] -= delta;
00448   bbox[2] += delta;
00449   bbox[3] += delta;
00450 }
00451 
00452 void psstream_impl::textbox(const char* text, double* bbox)
00453 {
00454   const short* bb = glyph_data;
00455   double s = font_size;
00456   const unsigned char* ch = (unsigned char*) text;
00457   if (*ch)
00458   {
00459     int c = *ch++;
00460     const short *b = bb + 5 * c;
00461     if (*ch)
00462     {
00463       bbox[0] = s * b[1] * 0.001;
00464       bbox[1] = s * b[2] * 0.001;
00465       bbox[2] = s * b[0] * 0.001;
00466       bbox[3] = s * b[4] * 0.001;
00467 
00468       for (c = *ch++; *ch; c = *ch++)
00469       {
00470         b = bb + 5 * c;
00471         bbox[1] = std::min(bbox[1], s * b[2] * 0.001);
00472         bbox[2] = bbox[2] + s * b[0] * 0.001;
00473         bbox[3] = std::max(bbox[3], s * b[4] * 0.001);
00474       }
00475 
00476       b = bb + 5 * c;
00477       bbox[1] = std::min(bbox[1], s * b[2] * 0.001);
00478       bbox[2] = bbox[2] + s * b[3] * 0.001;
00479       bbox[3] = std::max(bbox[3], s * b[4] * 0.001);
00480     }
00481     else
00482     {
00483       bbox[0] = s * b[1] * 0.001;
00484       bbox[1] = s * b[2] * 0.001;
00485       bbox[2] = s * b[0] * 0.001;
00486       bbox[3] = s * b[4] * 0.001;
00487     }
00488   }
00489   // resize_box(bbox, line_width);
00490 }
00491 
00492 void psstream_impl::selectmedia(psstream::Format f, psstream::Orientation o)
00493 {
00494   if (page != 0)
00495     return;
00496 
00497   format = f;
00498   orientation = o;
00499   out << "<< /PageSize [" << media_width[f] << ' ' << media_height[f] << "] >> setpagedevice\n";
00500 }

00502 double psstream_impl::pagewidth() const
00503 {
00504   if (orientation == psstream::PORTRAIT)
00505   {
00506     return media_width[format];
00507   }
00508   return media_height[format];
00509 }

00514   {

00516   }
00517   return media_height[format];
00518 }

00532 bool psstream_impl::getbbox(double *bb)
00533 {
00534   if (!page->has_bbox)
00535     return false;
00536 
00537   bb[0] = page->bbox[0];
00538   bb[1] = page->bbox[1];
00539   bb[2] = page->bbox[2];
00540   bb[3] = page->bbox[3];
00541   return true;
00542 }
00543 
00544 void psstream_impl::setbbox(bool f, double *bb)
00545 {
00546   page->has_bbox = f;
00547   page->bbox[0] = bb[0];
00548   page->bbox[1] = bb[1];
00549   page->bbox[2] = bb[2];
00550   page->bbox[3] = bb[3];
00551 }

00553 void psstream_impl::setdash(int n, int* pp, int o)
00554 {
00555   out << "[";
00556   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00557   {
00558     out << ((i+1) % 8 == 0? '\n': ' ') << pp[i];
00559   }
00560   out << " ] " << o << " setdash\n";
00561 }

00637 void psstream::rotate(double a)
00638 {
00639   impl->rotate(a);
00640 }
00641

00676 
00677 void psstream::annot(double x, double y, double r, double angle, \
00678   annot_type anchor, bool show, const char* text, double bbox[8])
00679 {
00680   impl->textbox(text, bbox);
00681   angle = modulo_range(angle, 360.0);
00682   double dx = bbox[2] - bbox[0];
00683   double dy = bbox[3] - bbox[1];
00684   double sx, sy = -0.5 * dy;
00685 
00686   if (anchor == ANNOT_RIGHT)
00687   {
00688     sx = r;
00689   }
00690   else if (anchor == ANNOT_LEFT)
00691   {
00692     sx = -dx-r;
00693   }
00694   else
00695   {
00696     sx = -0.5*dx;
00697   }
00698 
00699   if (show)
00700   {
00701     double bb[4];
00702     bool is_valid = impl->getbbox(bb);
00703     impl->command("matrix currentmatrix");
00704     impl->translate(x, y);
00705     impl->rotate(angle);
00706     impl->moveto(sx-bbox[0], sy-bbox[1]);
00707     impl->show(text);
00708     impl->command("setmatrix");
00709     impl->setbbox(is_valid, bb);
00710   }
00711 
00712   bbox[0] = bbox[6] = sx;
00713   bbox[1] = bbox[3] = sy;
00714   bbox[2] = bbox[4] = sx+dx;
00715   bbox[5] = bbox[7] = sy+dy;
00716 
00717   angle = 2*M_PI*angle/360.0;
00718   dx = cos(angle);
00719   dy = sin(angle);
00720   sx = bbox[0];
00721   sy = bbox[1];
00722   bbox[0] = x + sx * dx - sy * dy;
00723   bbox[1] = y + sx * dy + sy * dx; 
00724   sx = bbox[2];
00725   sy = bbox[3];
00726   bbox[2] = x + sx * dx - sy * dy;
00727   bbox[3] = y + sx * dy + sy * dx; 
00728   sx = bbox[4];
00729   sy = bbox[5];
00730   bbox[4] = x + sx * dx - sy * dy;
00731   bbox[5] = y + sx * dy + sy * dx; 
00732   sx = bbox[6];
00733   sy = bbox[7];
00734   bbox[6] = x + sx * dx - sy * dy;
00735   bbox[7] = y + sx * dy + sy * dx; 
00736 
00737   if (show)
00738   {
00739     impl->updatebb(bbox[0], bbox[0], bbox[1], bbox[1]);
00740     impl->updatebb(bbox[2], bbox[2], bbox[3], bbox[3]);
00741     impl->updatebb(bbox[4], bbox[4], bbox[5], bbox[5]);
00742     impl->updatebb(bbox[6], bbox[6], bbox[7], bbox[7]);
00743   }
00744 }
00745 
00746 void textsite(double x, double y, double r, double d, double bb[4])
00747 {
00748   double dx = bb[2] - bb[0];
00749   double dy = bb[3] - bb[1];
00750   double x0, y0, ds = M_PI * r;
00751   d = modulo_range(d, 2.0) * (dx + dy + ds);
00752   if (d < 0.5*dy)
00753   {
00754     x0 = r;
00755     y0 = -0.5*dy + d;
00756   }
00757   else if (d < 0.5*dy + 0.5*ds)
00758   {
00759     double a = (d - 0.5*dy) / r;
00760     x0 = r * cos(a);
00761     y0 = r * sin(a);
00762   }
00763   else if (d < 0.5*dy + 0.5*ds + dx)
00764   {
00765     x0 = 0.5*dy + 0.5*ds - d;
00766     y0 = r;
00767   }
00768   else if (d < 0.5*dy + ds + dx)
00769   {
00770     double a = (d - 0.5*dy - dx) / r;
00771     x0 = r * cos(a) - dx;
00772     y0 = r * sin(a);
00773   }
00774   else if (d < 1.5*dy + ds + dx)
00775   {
00776     x0 = -r - dx;
00777     y0 = 0.5*dy + ds + dx - d;
00778   }
00779   else if (d < 1.5*dy + 1.5*ds + dx)
00780   {
00781     double a = (d - 1.5*dy - dx) / r;
00782     x0 = r * cos(a) - dx;
00783     y0 = r * sin(a) - dy;
00784   }
00785   else if (d < 1.5*dy + 1.5*ds + 2.0*dx)
00786   {
00787     x0 = -dx + (d - 1.5*dy - 1.5*ds - dx);
00788     y0 = -r - dy;
00789   }
00790   else if (d < 1.5*dy + 2.0*ds + 2.0*dx)
00791   {
00792     double a = (d - 1.5*dy - 2.0*dx) / r;
00793     x0 = r * cos(a);
00794     y0 = r * sin(a) - dy;
00795   }
00796   else
00797   {
00798     x0 = r;
00799     y0 = -dy + (d - 1.5*dy - 2.0*ds - 2.0*dx);
00800   }
00801   bb[0] = x+x0;
00802   bb[1] = y+y0;
00803   bb[2] = x+x0+dx;
00804   bb[3] = y+y0+dy;
00805 }
00806 
00807 void label(psstream& out, double x, double y, double r, \
00808   label_type justify, bool show, const char* text, double bb[4])
00809 {
00810   out.textbox(text, bb);
00811   double dx = bb[2] - bb[0];
00812   double dy = bb[3] - bb[1];
00813   double ss = 2.0 * M_PI * r;
00814   double dd = 2.0 * (dx + dy) + ss;
00815   double x0 = bb[0];
00816   double y0 = bb[1];
00817   switch (justify)
00818   {
00819   case psstream::LABEL_E:
00820     textsite(x, y, r, 0.0, bb);
00821     break;
00822   case psstream::LABEL_N:
00823     textsite(x, y, r, 0.5, bb);
00824     break;
00825   case psstream::LABEL_W:
00826     textsite(x, y, r, 1.0, bb);
00827     break;
00828   case psstream::LABEL_S:
00829     textsite(x, y, r, 1.5, bb);
00830     break;
00831   case psstream::LABEL_NE:
00832     textsite(x, y, r, 2.0 * (0.5 * dy + 0.125 * ss) / dd, bb);
00833     break;
00834   case psstream::LABEL_NW:
00835     textsite(x, y, r, 2.0 * (0.5 * dy + dx + 0.375 * ss) / dd, bb);
00836     break;
00837   case psstream::LABEL_SW:
00838     textsite(x, y, r, 2.0 * (1.5 * dy + dx + 0.625 * ss) / dd, bb);
00839     break;
00840   case psstream::LABEL_SE:
00841     textsite(x, y, r, 2.0 * (1.5 * dy + 2.0 * dx + 0.875 * ss) / dd, bb);
00842     break;
00843   }
00844   if (show)
00845   {
00846     out.moveto(bb[0]-x0, bb[1]-y0);
00847     out.show(text);
00848   }
00849 }
00850 
00851 void hlabel(psstream& out, double x, double y, double r, label_type justify,
00852   bool show, const char* text, double bbox[4])
00853 {
00854   if (justify == psstream::LABEL_N || justify == psstream::LABEL_S)
00855   {
00856     label(out, x, y, r, justify, show, text, bbox);
00857   }
00858   else if (justify == psstream::LABEL_E || justify == psstream::LABEL_NE)
00859   {
00860     double rect[8];
00861     out.annot(x, y, r, 270.0, psstream::ANNOT_LEFT, show, text, rect);
00862     bbox[0] = rect[2];
00863     bbox[1] = rect[3];
00864     bbox[2] = rect[6];
00865     bbox[3] = rect[7];
00866   }
00867   else if (justify == psstream::LABEL_W || justify == psstream::LABEL_NW)
00868   {
00869     double rect[8];
00870     out.annot(x, y, r, 90.0, psstream::ANNOT_RIGHT, show, text, rect);
00871     bbox[0] = rect[6];
00872     bbox[1] = rect[7];
00873     bbox[2] = rect[2];
00874     bbox[3] = rect[3];
00875   }
00876   else if (justify == psstream::LABEL_SE)
00877   {
00878     double rect[8];
00879     out.annot(x, y, r, 270.0, psstream::ANNOT_RIGHT, show, text, rect);
00880     bbox[0] = rect[2];
00881     bbox[1] = rect[3];
00882     bbox[2] = rect[6];
00883     bbox[3] = rect[7];
00884   }
00885   else if (justify == psstream::LABEL_SW)
00886   {
00887     double rect[8];
00888     out.annot(x, y, r, 90.0, psstream::ANNOT_LEFT, show, text, rect);
00889     bbox[0] = rect[6];
00890     bbox[1] = rect[7];
00891     bbox[2] = rect[2];
00892     bbox[3] = rect[3];
00893   }
00894 }
00895 
00896 void vlabel(psstream& out, double x, double y, double r, label_type justify, \
00897   bool show, const char* text, double bbox[4])
00898 {
00899   if (justify == psstream::LABEL_E || justify == psstream::LABEL_W)
00900   {
00901     label(out, x, y, r, justify, show, text, bbox);
00902   }
00903   else if (justify == psstream::LABEL_S \
00904     || justify == psstream::LABEL_SW || justify == psstream::LABEL_SE)
00905   {
00906     double rect[8];
00907     out.annot(x, y, 0.0, 90.0, psstream::ANNOT_CENTER, false, text, rect);
00908     out.annot(x + (justify != psstream::LABEL_SE? -0.5:0.5) * (rect[2]-rect[6]+2.0*r), \
00909       y, 0.0, 90.0, psstream::ANNOT_CENTER, show, text, rect);
00910     bbox[0] = rect[6];
00911     bbox[1] = rect[7];
00912     bbox[2] = rect[2];
00913     bbox[3] = rect[3];
00914   }
00915   else if (justify == psstream::LABEL_N \
00916     || justify == psstream::LABEL_NW || justify == psstream::LABEL_NE)
00917   {
00918     double rect[8];
00919     out.annot(x, y, 0.0, 270.0, psstream::ANNOT_CENTER, false, text, rect);
00920     out.annot(x + (justify != psstream::LABEL_NE? -0.5:0.5) * (rect[6]-rect[2]+2.0*r), \
00921       y, 0.0, 270.0, psstream::ANNOT_CENTER, show, text, rect);
00922     bbox[0] = rect[2];
00923     bbox[1] = rect[3];
00924     bbox[2] = rect[6];
00925     bbox[3] = rect[7];
00926   }
00927 }

00976 void driver_1(psstream& out, const char* text)
00977 {
00978   double bb[4];
00979   for (int i = 0; i < 200; ++i)
00980   {
00981     out.newpage();
00982     textsite(out, 200, 200, 10, 2.0*i/100.0, false, text, bb);
00983     
00984     out.setgray(0.5);
00985     out.moveto(bb[0], bb[1]);
00986     out.lineto(bb[2], bb[1]);
00987     out.lineto(bb[2], bb[3]);
00988     out.lineto(bb[0], bb[3]);
00989     out.lineto(bb[0], bb[1]);
00990     out.fill();
00991 
00992     out.setgray(0);
00993     out.arc(200, 200, 10, 0, 360);
00994     out.stroke();
00995     
00996     out.setgray(1);
00997     textsite(out, 200, 200, 10, 2.0*i/100.0, true, text, bb);
00998   }
00999 }

01001 void main()
01002 {
01003   double bb[4];
01004   psstream out("zz.ps");
01005   out.selectmedia(psstream::FORMAT_A4, psstream::LANDSCAPE);
01006   out.setfont(FONT_22, 10.0);
01007 
01008   const char* text = "";
01009 
01010   out.newpage();
01011   out.setlinewidth(0.0);
01012   out.newpath();
01013   out.arc(200, 200, 5.0, 0.0, 360.0);
01014   out.stroke();
01015   label(out, 200, 200, 5.0, LABEL_E, true, text, bb);
01016   out.newpath();
01017   out.moveto(bb[0], bb[1]);
01018   out.lineto(bb[2], bb[1]);

01021   out.lineto(bb[0], bb[1]);
